trans-unit.source: Represents a service that provides properties and methods to control the display and behavior of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> controls.
Adds a handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup"></xref> attached event.
The object to which the attached event is added.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.CanAddToQuickAccessToolBarDirectly"></xref> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.CheckedBackground"></xref> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.CheckedBorderBrush"></xref> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.ControlSizeDefinition"></xref> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.

The object from which the property value is read.

The object from which the property value is read.
